title: Exclusive Interview: Noah Hawley on Fargo Season 2
text:
Exclusive Interview: Noah Hawley on Fargo Season 2 
Published By: Slashfilm.com - Today 
Noah Hawley did the seeming impossible, turning the Coen Brothers acclaimed film Fargo into a TV series. Not only did he do the name justice... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
